author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Additional District Judge-I on Tuesday convicted two men and sentenced them to life imprisonment as they were found guilty of murder.

The prosecution case was that Ramesh Kumar (19), and Marikannu (19) of Kallampalayam in Virudhunagar district killed Raja (20) of Melur in Madurai district when he refused to give them money, on February 3, 2013.

All the three were staying on a construction site at Hope College.

Both of them were lodged in a Borstal school in Pollachi, and were later granted bail.

The judge, M. Christopher, has slapped a fine of Rs. 1,000 too on them.
title: Life term for two youth
